name: Try to catch Floating Similar
description:
Try to catch any string which looks like floating point number/string.
Real test will be apply later.
content:
//wrong - marked, but should not be becase of '-' or '+' after mantissa
.1-
1.2-
2.3-e
1.2+

1

1.2
